Wow, this food is good. We had burrata then sirloin steak with Gorgonzola sauce. The sauce was thin and preserved the natural steak flavor. The steak rocked. We had two pizza pies. One with chorizo, ham, tuna and mushrooms. The second with salmon. Both pizzas were so yummy and savory. Service was terrific. We are lucky to have eaten here. Game changer.
